example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تخشى) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP واشنطن)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يتوجه) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC_POSS مقاتلي) (NP (PUNC ") (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القاعدة) (PUNC "))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذين)) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يفرون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-DIR (PREP من) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN افغانستان))) (PP-DIR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN جبال) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN اليمن))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الوعرة)))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to the rugged mountains of Yemen
